thraiwabhumika sanskarawala thrishalaksha na sammarshanayakota pasuwa ehima praathyana washayen ksharana washayen udayawyaiya baliya yuthuya.panychaskandha washayen eya samapanas aakarawe.mehi udaya nam namarupayanhi nibbanthi lakshunayayi.waya nam wiparinama laksha nawu bhanggayayi.namarupadiyata pra thyanaya nam karmadiyayi.ksha na nam nibbaththi ksha.naya ha waya kshamanayayi.rupaskandhaye prarathyi ha ksha na se udayawyayaya balime swarupaya meparidiya.awidyana,thrushna,karmasha ha aahara yana hethupradhathyapa sathara nisa rupa samudaya athiwe.esema rupaskandhuye nibbaththi kshawanaya ha waya kshakanayada baliya yuthuya.mese kshanana washayen balima samanga gathwita rupaye udaya pas aakaraya we.elesama waya pas aakarawe.

janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha sathu tharkika deshapalana gnyanaya ha jathyanthara piliganima hethuwen indiya agamathi narendra modi samanga suhadathawa wardhanaya kara ganimata haki wu bawa warimarga ha jalasampath kalamanakarana amathi nimal siripala da silwa mahatha pawasiya.ehi prathipalayak lesa indu lanka sambandhathawaye nawa pituwak peralimata janadhipathithumanta haki wu bawada hethema kiweya.shri lanka nidahas paksha mulasthanaye eeye (29) madhya hamuwata sahabhagi wemin amathiwaraya ese prakasha keleya.13wani wyawastha sanshodhanayen eha giya balayak uthurata laba dena lesata indiya agamathiwaraya janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathata pawasa athi dayi madhyawediyaku nangu prashnayata pilithuru dun amathiwaraya kiya sitiye eya rajyathanthrika mattamen pawathi sakachchawak nisa ee gana prakashayak kala nohaki bawayi.
